description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.cQtmz297P5g6g5xv]{Advanced Mods}

Choose one type of energy for which your drone already has the resistance mod. Increase your droneâ€™s resistance to that energy type by 5. You can select this mod multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you select this mod, it applies to a different energy type for which your drone has the resistance mod.
